definition: clear soup/white broth, also called 奶湯|奶汤[nai3 tang1]/decoction of chrysanthemum, liquorice and certain other herbs

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The soup that mom cooked tastes very good!
sentences.chinese: 煮火锅时用白汤煮味道很鲜。

sentences.english: Natalia also drink a whitening beauty cream soup.
sentences.chinese: 还好喝了娜塔美白汤祛斑。

sentences.english: I could just prefer the white soup tonight with less oil and chillies .
sentences.chinese: 今晚我比较喜欢白汤，因为少油少辣。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe four white soups be curing the clinical application value in the cervical vertebra disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察四白汤在治疗颈椎病中的临床应用价值。

raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
